pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: Floppy Disks can store the URL to a MIDI file found either on the internet or saved onto the server.

pages.title: Properties
pages.text: The Floppy Disk stores three things:$(br2)1. A Title for the Disk$(br2)1.The URL for the MIDI file$(br2)3. The Author of the Disk$(br2)To write data to a blank Floppy use a Disk Writer block. Once written to, a Floppy Disk cannot be written to again.

pages.title: Dyeing
pages.text: The Floppy Disk can be dyed by combining it with any dye item in a crafting grid.$(br2)The dye can be washed off by right-clicking a Cauldron with Water while holding the Floppy Disk.
